abraham_lincoln.name: Abraham Lincoln
abraham_lincoln.description: 16th President of the United States, led the Union during the Civil War.

marie_curie.name: Marie Curie
marie_curie.description: Pioneer in radioactivity, first person to win two Nobel Prizes in different scientific fields.

frederick_douglass.name: Frederick Douglass
frederick_douglass.description: Abolitionist, author, orator, and statesman who escaped slavery and became a national leader of the abolitionist movement.
